TextView.android:text:
Application to synchronize information between laptop/computer, smartphone and a cloud. 
 
 Two way communication between the devices as follows: 
 
 client device is the device that initiates update. 
 
 Server device is going to accept the update. 
 
 1.laptop initiates TCP or UDP comunication with cloud. 
 
 Send a file to the cloud. 
 
 The cloud receives it and updates. 
 
 2. Smartphone initiates TCP or UDP communication with the cloud. 
 
 a. Send a file to the cloud and laptop 
 
 The cloud and alptop rceives it and updates it. 
 
 b. queries for latest copy of file 
 
 Smartphone receives it. 
 
 3. Cloud initiates TCP or UDP communication with the laptop. 
 
 Send a file to the laptop and cloud. 
 
 Laptop and cloud receives and updates the info.
